about_the_game:
Continuing from the previous chapter, you will cleverly utilize funds from developed countries to create a world-renowned magical island. Your celebrity girlfriends will become the female leads of your movie investments. How will you handle your relationships with them?

Become a Prince: You will play as a person chosen by a divine system, transported to become the prince of a rising small country, New Han. In this world filled with opportunities and challenges, you will complete your university education discreetly and then begin to develop your country using the powers granted by the divine system.

Divine System Powers: The system endows you with extraordinary abilities, including acquiring vast wealth, recruiting top-tier talent, and developing energy resources. You will use these powers to solve various problems facing your country and propel New Han towards prosperity and strength.

Rise of a Business Empire: You will quickly rise in the financial and entertainment industries, making shrewd business decisions that earn you immense wealth. Your success not only garners you a reputation but also lays a solid foundation for New Han's economic development.

Responsibility for National Development: Beyond commercial competition, you must also navigate complex family dynamics and political challenges. How will you balance your personal life with the heavy responsibility of national development and lead New Han to a brighter future?

content_descriptors.notes: Mature content with normal sexual behavior appears in the game

In this world filled with opportunities and challenges, you will complete your university education discreetly and then begin to develop your country using the powers granted by the divine system.

Rise of a Business Empire: You will quickly rise in the financial and entertainment industries, making shrewd business decisions that earn you immense wealth. Your success not only garners you a reputation but also lays a solid foundation for New Han's economic development.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Become a prince chosen by a divine system in the rising country of New Han. Use your powers to build a business empire, manage complex relationships with multiple beautiful and sexy female celebrity girlfriends, and lead your nation to prosperity. Your choices shape the future.
supported_languages:
French, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
